answers.answer: Try drinking some orange juice, or apple juice, the sugar might help you a little bit. When I get dizzy I drink some chocolate milk. Food should help too, but since it's not helping, you should call your dr to find out if what you are feling is ok or if you need to go get checked out. How is your blood pressure... because if it's on the low side that will cause dizziness too Good luck!
Thanks. I have made an appointment for this afternoon. I do have gestational diabetes as well, but have never had this happen. Fingers crosses its all good. :-)

So after spending 30mins in with the Dr (not my normal DR)... He doesnt no why I feel like this. BP is fine...temp fine... Sugars fine...Did 4 urine tests and they all came back with different results. So he's sent it away.And I will have to wait a few days and see how I feel.But he touched my belly and said "ur still pregnant"!! Seriously... I waisted $100 and 30mins for u to tell me what I clearly already no!!!! So not impressed!!!

question: Im 34 weeks and I am so light headed!! I woke up and got outta bed slowly, but I can't walk straight and the room is moving. I feel like a I want to be sick but I havnt.I ate some food and laid on my left side. Nothing seems to be helping. Now my eyes are all heavy and sometimes blury. Anyone else have this.
title: Dizzy at 34weeks?
